title: Striking Five-Star Romania Escape overlooking Bucharest's George Enescu Square
description: Discover the best of Bucharest with a five-star stay at InterContinental Athenee Palace Bucharest, an IHG Hotel. Steeped in over 100 years of heritage, this urban retreat overlooking George Enescu Square places you just steps from the Romanian Athenaeum and Royal Palace. When you're not exploring the local sights, stay in and be spoilt for choice with  an onsite spa, two excellent onsite restaurants, a bar, a shimmering pool and a secluded terrace.
location_description: InterContinental Athenee Palace Bucharest, an IHG Hotel

title: Vibrant Bucharest City Escape with Three Restaurants
description: Explore Romania's energetic capital city from Crowne Plaza Bucharest, an IHG Hotel - a modern escape located across from King Mihai Park. When you're not exploring the city's sights, spend a day pampering yourself at ANA Spa, where you can relax with a soothing massage, steam bathing or a sauna session. Three onsite restaurants offer plenty of choice: opt for Mediterranean marvels, buffet breakfasts or sophisticated al fresco dining on a leafy terrace.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Bucharest, an IHG Hotel
